forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon light unfurls upon the city, casting a warm embrace on its iconic streets. The sky is unblemished, a clear azure expanse that speaks of sunlit possibilities—a perfect antidote to the bustling energies of the day. Gentle winds from the west southwest weave through the air, whispering secrets of the bay, ruffling leaf and flower alike. The temperature begins to weave into a pleasant realm, hinting at 65 degrees, inviting people to shed their heavier layers and don lighter attire. 

As the sun dips toward evening, the city will transition into a serene party of partly cloudy skies, accompanied by a mild cooling as night approaches, settling around 56 degrees. This wraps the day in a comforting blanket, well-suited for a stroll along the Embarcadero or an evening spent in a cozy corner café, perhaps with a good book or engaging conversation. Dressing smartly in layers would serve you well—light clothing for the warmth of the sun and a soft jacket for when the night air begins to whisper. Step outside and embrace the day, for moments of clarity such as these are treasures to behold.
